ðŸ“· 
  Kendall and Zach are back on All My Children this week -- and boy, do they bring some drama with them! Greenlee and Kendall's reunion isn't exactly a happy one. See, Greens gets her "frenemy" to admit that she was the driver of the car that ran her off the road last year -- and it goes as badly as you'd expect. In fact, it's worse. Greenlee is certain that Kendall did it on purpose! When Erica and Ryan arrive, look for things to get even more insane -- especially once Zach gives Kendall an ultimatum that could change everything. 

   I hope to God that ultimatum is to choose him and the boys or her two abusers!Â  An ultimatum Zach should have given her the very day that The Green Thing came back to town in 2007!
  ðŸ“· 

BTW, make sure that you catch a special version of Monday's episode -- featuring commentary from Rebecca Budig (Greenlee) -- right here on ABC.com!  Learn more about it here.  

  Oh Gee, I can't wait ðŸ“·
  
If JR feels sick after sleeping with Annie (yes, they totally do the deed), he feels even worse when Marissa arrives at his hotel room. Since her swine flu is gone, she wanted to surprise her husband. Will she be the one who gets surprised instead? 

  My Copy and Paste buttons could not handle the grossness in the picture ofÂ Joonyer with Insannie, so I leave that to your fertile imaginations, that is if you want nightmares interrupting yourÂ Zach dreams!  
   Â 
ðŸ“· Back in Pine Valley, David manages to save Adam's life (again) and gets him to the hospital after his latest heart attack. While Adam may have pulled through this time, David makes it clear that if Adam wants to continue living, he has to do the unthinkable: give up Chandler Enterprises. 

Through all of this, Brooke is by Adam's side (since, y'know, his wife is a little busy having sex with his son in DC!) -- and she offers him the support he needs. In more ways than one. The two kiss ... and it's caught on tape.Â 
ðŸ“· Meanwhile, David's trial continues as planned. When he discovers his wife is with Kendall, he freaks out and demands that Liza do everything she can to get him off -- even if it means playing dirty. At this point, he needs a miracle to stay out of jail. Lucky for David, someone in Pine Valley has a surprise up his/her sleeve. 

All this, PLUS: Brot does something surprising; Amanda has a stalker; and Damon gets a wake-up call. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I will copy here what I posted on April 5 Sneak Peek thread about today's episode.Â Â  Yeah, TIIC really know how to twist the knife in our (and Zach's) backs!Â  The Little Fucker invades Spain, and with the worst accusations!Â  I hope, I REALLY hope Zach is allowed to call him on his shit this time, including the casino buying.Â  It's his and ours last chance!
So here is what I posted on the other thread:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
OKaye, some updates for those who WANT to know what is going on, but don't have the stomach to watch on Zachless days, LOL :

EEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!Â Â Majorca, Spain!!!!!!!!!!!!

In the opening segment, as Erica is telling Kendall that she has arrived in Spain, Kendall turns around to find The Green Monster standing in front of her!Â  (I guess I was wrong about Kendall appearing at 12:55 in today's episode.Â  Now she really has two full episodes before we get to see Zach!)

But before that scene, JackASSHOLE prompted me to blurt out a few choice words when he said for the 4,279th time that HIS DAUGHTER deserves to hear the truth!Â  Did THE TRUTH matter to him when it was HIS DAUGHTER that drove Spikey off the road?Â  No, he instructed the bitch to keep her mouth shut, and HE also kept shut to protect her ðŸ“·

And The DEADTOME LizaÂ tried (and thankfully failed)Â to bring Zach's name into Dr. Death's poison pills for Adam!Â  

And worst of the worst:Â  The Li'l Fucker suddenly misses HISSON, claiming he is being kept away fromÂ his child, called it a father's worst nightmare (he has no idea what he is talking about, esp. since he ain't much of a father), accuses Kendall of only calling when she knows he is busy or asleep,  accuses Slaters of NOT BEING STRAIGHT WITH HIM about them being away for months Â "it wasn't supposed to go on for this long"!!!!!Â  "I am not saying they kidnapped Spike or anything"Â  WOW, that's swell of you!!!!!!!!!Â  And now he is hopping on a plane to be there!Â  FUCKER, I hope his plane crashes so he wouldn't infect Zach'sÂ (and mine too) paradiseÂ Majorca!Â  Fucking TIIC, they HAVE TO bring the asshole into Zach's few precious moments ðŸ“·
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I don'tÂ know how the fucker can even utter the words that Slaters were not being straight with him!Â  HE is the one who always played under-handed games, describing his own actions as "sneaky", he is the one who has always played dirty with the most honorable man to ever walk into PV!Â  And Kathy(km wilson)'s response is very accurate!Â  There is a whole fleet of buses coming The Slater's way!

As angry as all this makes me, I know one thing for sure:Â  TK and his Zach will mesmerize me for those three episodes as always!Â  He will make sense out of all the most senseless shit that the "writers" are trying to shove down my throat!Â  He will give us his best!Â  And this time, my heart will really, really break, knowing that Zach is leaving my screen for good!
data.text:
Eeeeeeeee! The first picture and the first word? ZZZZZZZZZach

My comments in brown, LOL.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SNEAK PEEK â€“ WEEK OF April 12

Kendall and Zach are back on All My Children this week -- and boy, do they bring some drama with them! Greenlee and Kendall's reunion isn't exactly a happy one. See, Greens gets her "frenemy" to admit that she was the driver of the car that ran her off the road last year -- and it goes as badly as you'd expect. In fact, it's worse. Greenlee is certain that Kendall did it on purpose! When Erica and Ryan arrive, look for things to get even more insane -- especially once Zach gives Kendall an ultimatum that could change everything.

I hope to God that ultimatum is to choose him and the boys or her two abusers! An ultimatum Zach should have given her the very day that The Green Thing came back to town in 2007!

BTW, make sure that you catch a special version of Monday's episode -- featuring commentary from Rebecca Budig (Greenlee) -- right here on ABC.com! Learn more about it here.

Oh Gee, I can't wait

If JR feels sick after sleeping with Annie (yes, they totally do the deed), he feels even worse when Marissa arrives at his hotel room. Since her swine flu is gone, she wanted to surprise her husband. Will she be the one who gets surprised instead?

My Copy and Paste buttons could not handle the grossness in the picture of Joonyer with Insannie, so I leave that to your fertile imaginations, that is if you want nightmares interrupting your Zach dreams!

Back in Pine Valley, David manages to save Adam's life (again) and gets him to the hospital after his latest heart attack. While Adam may have pulled through this time, David makes it clear that if Adam wants to continue living, he has to do the unthinkable: give up Chandler Enterprises.

Through all of this, Brooke is by Adam's side (since, y'know, his wife is a little busy having sex with his son in DC!) -- and she offers him the support he needs. In more ways than one. The two kiss ... and it's caught on tape.

Meanwhile, David's trial continues as planned. When he discovers his wife is with Kendall, he freaks out and demands that Liza do everything she can to get him off -- even if it means playing dirty. At this point, he needs a miracle to stay out of jail. Lucky for David, someone in Pine Valley has a surprise up his/her sleeve.

All this, PLUS: Brot does something surprising; Amanda has a stalker; and Damon gets a wake-up call.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I will copy here what I posted on April 5 Sneak Peek thread about today's episode. Yeah, TIIC really know how to twist the knife in our (and Zach's) backs! The Little Fucker invades Spain, and with the worst accusations! I hope, I REALLY hope Zach is allowed to call him on his shit this time, including the casino buying. It's his and ours last chance!

So here is what I posted on the other thread:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

OKaye, some updates for those who WANT to know what is going on, but don't have the stomach to watch on Zachless days, LOL :

EEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!! Majorca, Spain!!!!!!!!!!!!

In the opening segment, as Erica is telling Kendall that she has arrived in Spain, Kendall turns around to find The Green Monster standing in front of her! (I guess I was wrong about Kendall appearing at 12:55 in today's episode. Now she really has two full episodes before we get to see Zach!)

But before that scene, JackASSHOLE prompted me to blurt out a few choice words when he said for the 4,279th time that HIS DAUGHTER deserves to hear the truth! Did THE TRUTH matter to him when it was HIS DAUGHTER that drove Spikey off the road? No, he instructed the bitch to keep her mouth shut, and HE also kept shut to protect her

And The DEADTOME Liza tried (and thankfully failed) to bring Zach's name into Dr. Death's poison pills for Adam!

And worst of the worst: The Li'l Fucker suddenly misses HISSON, claiming he is being kept away from his child, called it a father's worst nightmare (he has no idea what he is talking about, esp. since he ain't much of a father), accuses Kendall of only calling when she knows he is busy or asleep, accuses Slaters of NOT BEING STRAIGHT WITH HIM about them being away for months "it wasn't supposed to go on for this long"!!!!! "I am not saying they kidnapped Spike or anything" WOW, that's swell of you!!!!!!!!! And now he is hopping on a plane to be there! FUCKER, I hope his plane crashes so he wouldn't infect Zach's (and mine too) paradise Majorca! Fucking TIIC, they HAVE TO bring the asshole into Zach's few precious moments

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I don't know how the fucker can even utter the words that Slaters were not being straight with him! HE is the one who always played under-handed games, describing his own actions as "sneaky", he is the one who has always played dirty with the most honorable man to ever walk into PV! And Kathy(km wilson)'s response is very accurate! There is a whole fleet of buses coming The Slater's way!

As angry as all this makes me, I know one thing for sure: TK and his Zach will mesmerize me for those three episodes as always! He will make sense out of all the most senseless shit that the "writers" are trying to shove down my throat! He will give us his best! And this time, my heart will really, really break, knowing that Zach is leaving my screen for good!

__________________

************************************** Thorsten Kaye Fan Forever!!!!! ************************************** Boy oh boy oh boy oh boy! What's worse? Watching Joonyer and Annie romp or a tearful, remorse-filled Kendall saying "I am sorry" to the worthless, soulless, emotionless DPW (Thanks Kathy, for refreshing my memory about her correct name)? I wish Kendall did not say that Zach covered up to save her from incriminating herself, but that he did it to save her stress because of her heart surgery and coma, etc. Now, DPW is lumping Zach into her list of enemies

As is the norm with AMC, history is being rewritten! Anyone surprised? I didn't think so. Kendall started comparing DPW's situation with her own (DPW can't understand why no one would tell her the truth since she came out of her coma, and Kendall saying it was same when she woke up from her coma). According to Kendall, everybody was afraid that she would not be able to handle the truth about Zach being the donor. Hello? It took Binks 2.7 seconds to brag about it, even though she had promised Zach that she would let HIM tell her! Stupid, stupid writers! Oh, and of course, DPW now claims that there was no accident, that Kendall did it because she wanted The Cup Holder to herself all along

But we got a glimpse of ZACH in a 3 second flashback, and my screen was on fire

22 hours and 15 minutes to go.....................

__________________

************************************** Thorsten Kaye Fan Forever!!!!! **************************************
